pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 98, XP, 7, 8, 8.1, 10
  • Storage: 60 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek High Definition Audio

Minimum:

  • Sound Card: Built-in sound card
